channel.title: Use item on object help
channel.description: How can I make it so they must have 3 items for the process to work?

Didn’t work, a lot of stuff were out of place, I’ll try figuring it out tomorrow or something.

item.title: Use item on object help
item.dc:creator: @danieb danieb
item.description:
@danieb wrote:

else if(useItemID == 747 && atObjectID == 297)//Dagger on Scarecrow
                                                   if(playerHasItemAmount(747, 1) {
				if(playerHasItemAmount(1195, 1) {
				if(playerHasItemAmount(4197, 1) {
				deleteItem(747,getItemSlot(747), 1);
				deleteItem(1195,getItemSlot(1195), 1);
				deleteItem(4197,getItemSlot(4197), 1);
				addItem(19, 1);
				}
				else {
				sendMessage("You do not have all the Knight's belongings.");
				}
                                                   else {
                                                   sendMessage("You do not have all the Knight's belongings.");
                                                   }
				else {
                                                   sendMessage("You do not have all the Knight's belongings.");
                                                   }
                                                   }
                                                   }
                                                   }

this should work

item.title: Use item on object help
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Edit: Nevermind, it still doesn’t work. My code looks like this:

else if(useItemID == 747 && atObjectID == 297)//Dagger on Scarecrow { deleteItem(747,getItemSlot(747), 1); deleteItem(1195,getItemSlot(1195), 1); deleteItem(4197,getItemSlot(4197), 1); addItem(19, 1); } else { if((playerHasItemAmount(747, 1)==false)) if((playerHasItemAmount(1195, 1)==false)) if((playerHasItemAmount(4197, 1)==false)) sendMessage("You do not have all the Knight's belongings."); }

No errors, it just doesn’t work.
